description:
A new survey from Cisco reveals that software developers are spending more than 57% of their time in “war room” meetings to resolve application performance issues, rather than focusing on building new software to drive innovation.  The findings highlight the immense pressure facing developers today. Globally, 85% of those surveyed report increased demands to accelerate... Read more »

The post Cisco: Developers spend majority of time firefighting appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Cisco: Developers spend majority of time firefighting
